response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable item. I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at $150. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to propose a different price. I look forward to hearing from you soon!", "product_price": 150}
